publicwhip.spmotion: S1M-2117 Transfer of Oil Revenue (lodged on 16 August 2001) Ms Sandra White*, Mr Kenneth Gibson*, Tommy Sheridan*, Bruce Crawford*, Linda Fabiani*, Mr Gil Paterson*, Mr Lloyd Quinan*, Mr Adam Ingram*
S1M-2117 Transfer of Oil Revenue (lodged on 16 August 2001) Christine Grahame*

S1M-2117 Alex Neil: Transfer of Oil Revenue—That the Parliament demands the immediate transfer of all Scottish oil revenues to the Scottish Parliament, a policy that would negate the need to levy any additional taxation on Scottish people through the "Tartan Tax", as a first step towards transferring all reserved matters to the Scottish Parliament. Supported by: Ms Sandra White, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Tommy Sheridan, Bruce Crawford, Linda Fabiani, Mr Gil Paterson, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Mr Adam Ingram, Christine Grahame
S1M-2117 Transfer of Oil Revenue (lodged on 16 August 2001) Shona Robison*

S1M-2117 Alex Neil: Transfer of Oil Revenue-That the Parliament demands the immediate transfer of all Scottish oil revenues to the Scottish Parliament, a policy that would negate the need to levy any additional taxation on Scottish people through the "Tartan Tax", as a first step towards transferring all reserved matters to the Scottish Parliament. Supported by: Ms Sandra White, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Tommy Sheridan, Bruce Crawford, Linda Fabiani, Mr Gil Paterson, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Mr Adam Ingram, Christine Grahame, Shona Robison, Dorothy-Grace Elder, Brian Adam

Supported by: Ms Sandra White, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Tommy Sheridan, Bruce Crawford, Linda Fabiani, Mr Gil Paterson, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Mr Adam Ingram, Christine Grahame, Shona Robison, Dorothy-Grace Elder, Brian Adam, Fiona Hyslop

Supported by: Ms Sandra White, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Tommy Sheridan, Bruce Crawford, Linda Fabiani, Mr Gil Paterson, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Mr Adam Ingram, Christine Grahame, Shona Robison, Dorothy-Grace Elder, Brian Adam, Fiona Hyslop

Supported by: Ms Sandra White, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Tommy Sheridan, Bruce Crawford, Linda Fabiani, Mr Gil Paterson, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Mr Adam Ingram, Christine Grahame, Shona Robison, Dorothy-Grace Elder, Brian Adam, Fiona Hyslop, Roseanna Cunningham, Fiona McLeod*
